content.question: If f(x) = (x + 2) sin <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <msqrt> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DA2@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, what is the average value of f on the closed interval [0, 6]?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval
